MBBS Admission in Russia at Mordovia State University

  • About Mordovia State University

About Mordovia State University

Mordovia State University is one of the top MBBS University in Russia which was founded in 1931 as the agronomy pedagogical institute.It has been granted the university status in 1957. It provides high - quality of education, research and training to the students.This university conducts lectures from guests, workshops and practical classes to provide practical training to the medical students.Mordovia State University is recognized by the MCI & WHO.The students need to complete practical and theoretical assignments at the end of each semester which enables them to get appropriate knowledge & to learn MBBS course in an efficient way.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

Indian students need to follow the below steps to take MBBS Admission in Russia:

  • The students need to fill the application form available on the university’s website.
  • They need to pay the registration charges & apply for the MBBS course.
  • The eligible students will receive an official invitation letter from the university.
  • Then they can apply for the visa.

Eligibility Criteria of Mordovia State University

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to study medical course in top MBBS University in Russia are as follows:

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take MBBS admission in Russia.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Benefits of taking German Classes in Bangalore from New - Lyf
  • Easy and efficient Learning Modules
  • Expert coaches with extensive experience in providing German language classes in Bangalore
  • Flexible timings for German Classes in Bangalore
  • Multiple batches starting every week
Advantage of taking German language classes in Bangalore
  • The German language is one of the ten languages widely spoken in the world and also one of the largest spoken languages in the European Union.
  • Germany is considered as the second - largest exporter in the world.
  • It is the 2n d most widely used scientific language around the world
  • Germany is the world leader in Engineering.
  • Germany has the world - best Universities providing high - quality education.
  • Indian students can easily study and even do a part - time job in Germany because they know the German language after taking German language classes in Bangalore
  • Jobseekers such as nurses and many more from different fields can easily get jobs in Germany if they know the German language as there lots of great job opportunities provided by Germany.
Conclusion

Destinex follows the guidelines that CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Languages) standardizes for learners of foreign languages.The level classified by CERF is A1 for beginners, A2 for elementary, B1 for intermediate, B2 for upper intermediate, C1 as advanced, and C2 as mastery.The courses at Destinex are divided as per the international rules.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.✔3500 + Students✔ 15 Countries✔ MBBS, MBA, PG, UG✔ 100 % Commitment✔ Education Loan✔ Job Placements
